title: my friend got hacked
body:
<REDACTED>
When my friend messaged me this url because he wanted to activate a tournament, it came up with, pvp.net. It told you to login like normal but instead, my friend got hacked. Please fix this!

replies.body:
Hey there,

I've gone ahead and removed the offending url from your post, please refrain from posting these types of URL's in the future.

Now onto the subject of your friends account, he'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support regarding account recovery.

Please submit the ticket under "**I need help recovering my account**"
